## DatabaseConnectionProvider.getConnection() method

Allocate new database connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getConnection(): Promise<DatabaseConnection>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<DatabaseConnection>`

Promise of the active database connection. The promise is rejected if the connection cannot be established.

## Remarks

After the connection is no longer needed it must be released via its [DatabaseConnection.release()](./db.databaseconnection.release.md) method.
